alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GULF...WESTERN WAKULLA... SOUTHERN LIBERTY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM EDT/115 AM CDT/... At 141 AM EDT/1241 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Apalachicola, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Jewel Fire Tower, Royal Bluff, Vilas, St George Island St Pk, Central City, Beverly, Poplar Camp, Kern, Nixon Garden, Simmons Bayou, Curtis Mill, Dalkeith, and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
